dict.acceptation: 喜悦，快乐，高兴；令人高兴的事（或人）；成功；好运；

sent.orig: Yes, please have Joy call (me) back. My number is 82684808.
sent.trans: 好的，请让Joy给我回电话。我的号码是82684808。

sent.orig: JOY's Day is a brand stores.
sent.trans: JOY是纪念日旗下的一个品牌形象店。

sent.orig: Yes, please have Joy call (me) back.
The ture joy of joys is the joy that joys in the joy of others.
DS: You know a long-term relationship isn't joy joy joy all the time.
sent.trans: 耽：一段长期关系并非所有时候都是快乐快乐快乐。
